abstract: ABB of Switzerland is near a deal to buy Thomas & Betts, an American maker of electrical connectors, for about $4 billion in cash, a person briefed on the matter said on Sunday.

lead_paragraph: 6:52 a.m. | Updated ABB of Switzerland agreed on Monday to buy Thomas & Betts, an American maker of electrical connectors, for about $3.9 billion in cash.

headline.main: ABB to Buy Thomas & Betts for $3.9 Billion
